resources.string:
Android BulletML is conversion of the Kenta Cho BulletML demo at http://www.asahi-net.or.jp/~cs8k-cyu/bulletml/index_e.html.


The source code for this application is available at http://code.google.com/p/netthreads-for-android 


About The Author


You can take a look around my current projects at http://www.netthreads.co.uk
